title: Why hasn't Captain America: Civil War been on the movie channels HBO, Starz, or Showtime?

og.title: Why hasn't Captain America: Civil War been on the movie channels HBO, Starz, or Showtime?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 4): I’m not entirely sure of my answer. So take it with a grain or three of salt.

However, I do remember Netflix and Disney making a deal that all of their movies were going to be shown on Netflix. I remember getting all excited thinking I could watch any of the MCU movies any time ...
